name: Titanic Hydra
simpleDescription: Deals area of effect damage based on owner's health

passives.name: Cleave
passives.effects: Basic attacks on-hit deal {{rd|1%|0.5s%}} maximum health hp bonus physical damage to the target and {{rd|3%|1.5s%}} maximum health hp physical damage to other enemies in a cone in the direction of the primary target.

active.name: Titanic Crescent
active.effects: Your next basic attack within 10 seconds empowers Cleave to deal {{rd|4%|2%}} maximum health hp bonus physical damage to the primary target and {{rd|9%|4.5s%}} maximum health hp physical damage to secondary targets (10 second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).
